languages.text: "Меня не покидает дурное предчувствие о встрече в эфемерном Дворце Атласа. Множество ночей мой разум наводняют беспокойные миражи. Голоса, зовущие и проклинающее меня. И чем чаще я использую Атлас, тем отчетливее видения, громче крики... И тем больше тают мои силы! Уверена, все в Доме ощущают то же самое, ибо мы связаны. Я чувствую страх моей семьи. Дом Орселлио обречен сгинуть во тьме, если я не узнаю причину ослабления Атласа. А причина... думаю, она сокрыта в видениях о Тисифоне".

traits.locale_text: "Меня не покидает дурное предчувствие о встрече в эфемерном Дворце Атласа. Множество ночей мой разум наводняют беспокойные миражи. Голоса, зовущие и проклинающее меня. И чем чаще я использую Атлас, тем отчетливее видения, громче крики... И тем больше тают мои силы! Уверена, все в Доме ощущают то же самое, ибо мы связаны. Я чувствую страх моей семьи. Дом Орселлио обречен сгинуть во тьме, если я не узнаю причину ослабления Атласа. А причина... думаю, она сокрыта в видениях о Тисифоне".

languages.text: "I cannot shake a certain foreboding about the upcoming meeting in the incorporeal Palace of the Atlas. Troubling mirages have plagued my mind for many nights now. Voices calling and cursing my name. And the more I use the Atlas, the clearer the visions become and the louder the voices grow... and the further my powers wane. I am certain that all of the House is experiencing the same, for all of us are connected. I can sense my family's fear. House Orsellio is doomed to perish in darkness should I fail to discover the reason why the Atlas is weakening. And that reason... I believe it is hidden somewhere in my visions of Tisiphone."
languages.original_text: "Меня не покидает дурное предчувствие о встрече в эфемерном Дворце Атласа. Множество ночей мой разум наводняют беспокойные миражи. Голоса, зовущие и проклинающее меня. languages.text: 「実体のないアトラスの宮殿でこれから始まる会議への悪い予感がくっきりとわき上がり、拭えないのです。厄介な幻影に私の精神は、今も幾夜となくむしばまれています。あたくしの名を呼んでは呪う声に。アトラスを使うほどにそのビジョンは鮮明に、声は大きくなって…あたくしの力が弱まっているのです。あたくしには、オーセリオ家全員が同じ実験をしていたという確信があります、全員がつながりを持っているのですから。一家は恐怖しています。万が一にもアトラスが衰えている理由を見つけられなければ、オーセリオ家は闇へと消える定めにあります。その理由が…あたくしが見たティシフォンのビジョンに隠されていると思うのです」
languages.original_text: "I cannot shake a certain foreboding about the upcoming meeting in the incorporeal Palace of the Atlas. Troubling mirages have plagued my mind for many nights now. Voices calling and cursing my name. And the more I use the Atlas, the clearer the visions become and the louder the voices grow... and the further my powers wane. I am certain that all of the House is experiencing the same, for all of us are connected. I can sense my family's fear. House Orsellio is doomed to perish in darkness should I fail to discover the reason why the Atlas is weakening. And that reason... I believe it is hidden somewhere in my visions of Tisiphone."

traits.locale_text: 「実体のないアトラスの宮殿でこれから始まる会議への悪い予感がくっきりとわき上がり、拭えないのです。厄介な幻影に私の精神は、今も幾夜となくむしばまれています。あたくしの名を呼んでは呪う声に。アトラスを使うほどにそのビジョンは鮮明に、声は大きくなって…あたくしの力が弱まっているのです。あたくしには、オーセリオ家全員が同じ実験をしていたという確信があります、全員がつながりを持っているのですから。一家は恐怖しています。万が一にもアトラスが衰えている理由を見つけられなければ、オーセリオ家は闇へと消える定めにあります。その理由が…あたくしが見たティシフォンのビジョンに隠されていると思うのです」

languages.text: “我总有种不祥的预感，是关于那座圣仪神殿的。那些幻象让我感到非常不安，已经困扰了我无数个夜晚。有很多声音在呼唤我的名字，诅咒我。我越是使用圣仪，那些幻象就越是清晰，声音也越是响亮……我的力量也越是衰弱。我很确信，整个家族都在经历同样的事情，因为我们所有人都紧密相连。我能感觉到，我的家族成员非常恐惧。如果我无法找到圣仪力量衰弱的原因，那奥赛罗家族注定会在黑暗中灭亡。至于圣仪力量衰弱的原因……我相信，它就藏在提西福涅那些幻象之中。”
languages.original_text: "I cannot shake a certain foreboding about the upcoming meeting in the incorporeal Palace of the Atlas. Troubling mirages have plagued my mind for many nights now. Voices calling and cursing my name. And the more I use the Atlas, the clearer the visions become and the louder the voices grow... and the further my powers wane. I am certain that all of the House is experiencing the same, for all of us are connected. I can sense my family's fear. House Orsellio is doomed to perish in darkness should I fail to discover the reason why the Atlas is weakening. And that reason... I believe it is hidden somewhere in my visions of Tisiphone."

traits.locale_text: “我总有种不祥的预感，是关于那座圣仪神殿的。那些幻象让我感到非常不安，已经困扰了我无数个夜晚。有很多声音在呼唤我的名字，诅咒我。我越是使用圣仪，那些幻象就越是清晰，声音也越是响亮……我的力量也越是衰弱。我很确信，整个家族都在经历同样的事情，因为我们所有人都紧密相连。我能感觉到，我的家族成员非常恐惧。如果我无法找到圣仪力量衰弱的原因，那奥塞罗家族注定会在黑暗中灭亡。至于圣仪力量衰弱的原因……我相信，它就藏在提西福涅那些幻象之中。”

languages.text: « J'ai un mauvais pressentiment concernant le rassemblement dans ce palais de l'Atlas incorporel. Voilà plusieurs nuits que des mirages inquiétants viennent troubler mon sommeil. Que des voix m'appellent et maudissent mon nom. Plus j'utilise l'Atlas, plus les visions sont claires et plus les voix sont fortes... et plus mes pouvoirs déclinent. Je suis certaine qu'il en est de même pour tous les membres de ma maison, car nous sommes tous liés. Je peux sentir leur peur. Si je ne parviens pas à découvrir pourquoi l'Atlas faiblit, la maison Orsellio est condamnée à périr dans les ténèbres. Et la réponse... Je pense qu'elle est cachée quelque part dans mes visions de Tisiphone. »
languages.original_text: "I cannot shake a certain foreboding about the upcoming meeting in the incorporeal Palace of the Atlas. Troubling mirages have plagued my mind for many nights now. Voices calling and cursing my name. And the more I use the Atlas, the clearer the visions become and the louder the voices grow... and the further my powers wane. I am certain that all of the House is experiencing the same, for all of us are connected. I can sense my family's fear. House Orsellio is doomed to perish in darkness should I fail to discover the reason why the Atlas is weakening. And that reason... I believe it is hidden somewhere in my visions of Tisiphone."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai un mauvais pressentiment concernant le rassemblement dans ce palais de l'Atlas incorporel. Voilà plusieurs nuits que des mirages inquiétants viennent troubler mon sommeil. Que des voix m'appellent et maudissent mon nom. Plus j'utilise l'Atlas, plus les visions sont claires et plus les voix sont fortes... et plus mes pouvoirs déclinent. Je suis certaine qu'il en est de même pour tous les membres de ma maison, car nous sommes tous liés. Je peux sentir leur peur. Si je ne parviens pas à découvrir pourquoi l'Atlas faiblit, la maison Orsellio est condamnée à périr dans les ténèbres. Et la réponse... Je pense qu'elle est cachée quelque part dans mes visions de Tisiphone. »

languages.text: «No puedo evitar cierta inquietud por el inminente encuentro en el incorpóreo palacio del Atlas. Hace ya muchas noches que unas quimeras atormentan mis sueños. Unas voces me llaman y maldicen mi nombre. Y cuanto más uso el Atlas, más nítidas se vuelven las visiones y más fuertes las voces... y más menguan mis poderes. Estoy segura de que toda la casa experimenta la misma desazón, pues estamos todos conectados. Puedo sentir el miedo de mi familia. La casa Orsellio está condenada a perecer en las tinieblas si no consigo descubrir el motivo de los fallos del Atlas. Y ese motivo... creo que está oculto en mis visiones de Tisiphone».
languages.original_text: "I cannot shake a certain foreboding about the upcoming meeting in the incorporeal Palace of the Atlas. Troubling mirages have plagued my mind for many nights now. Voices calling and cursing my name. And the more I use the Atlas, the clearer the visions become and the louder the voices grow... and the further my powers wane. I am certain that all of the House is experiencing the same, for all of us are connected. I can sense my family's fear. House Orsellio is doomed to perish in darkness should I fail to discover the reason why the Atlas is weakening. And that reason... I believe it is hidden somewhere in my visions of Tisiphone."

traits.locale_text: «No puedo evitar cierta inquietud por el inminente encuentro en el incorpóreo palacio del Atlas. Hace ya muchas noches que unas quimeras atormentan mis sueños. Unas voces me llaman y maldicen mi nombre. Y cuanto más uso el Atlas, más nítidas se vuelven las visiones y más fuertes las voces... y más menguan mis poderes. Estoy segura de que toda la casa experimenta la misma desazón, pues estamos todos conectados. Puedo sentir el miedo de mi familia. La casa Orsellio está condenada a perecer en las tinieblas si no consigo descubrir el motivo de los fallos del Atlas. Y ese motivo... creo que está oculto en mis visiones de Tisiphone».

languages.text: "Ich kann ein gewisses Unbehagen, was das bevorstehende Treffen im körperlosen Palast des Atlas angeht, nicht abschütteln. Beunruhigende Visionen plagen seit vielen Nächten meinen Geist. Stimmen rufen und verfluchen meinen Namen. Und je mehr ich den Atlas nutze, desto klarer werden die Visionen und desto lauter werden die Stimmen ... und desto mehr lassen meine Kräfte nach. Ich bin sicher, dass das ganze Haus dasselbe erlebt, denn wir sind alle miteinander verbunden. Ich kann die Angst meiner Familie spüren. Das Haus Orsellio ist dazu verdammt, in der Dunkelheit zu verenden, sollte ich nicht in Erfahrung bringen, warum der Atlas geschwächt wird. Und ich glaube ... Ich glaube, dass der Grund irgendwo in meinen Visionen von Tisiphone verborgen liegt."
languages.original_text: "I cannot shake a certain foreboding about the upcoming meeting in the incorporeal Palace of the Atlas. Troubling mirages have plagued my mind for many nights now. Voices calling and cursing my name. And the more I use the Atlas, the clearer the visions become and the louder the voices grow... and the further my powers wane. I am certain that all of the House is experiencing the same, for all of us are connected. I can sense my family's fear. House Orsellio is doomed to perish in darkness should I fail to discover the reason why the Atlas is weakening. And that reason... I believe it is hidden somewhere in my visions of Tisiphone."

traits.locale_text: "Ich kann ein gewisses Unbehagen, was das bevorstehende Treffen im körperlosen Palast des Atlas angeht, nicht abschütteln. Beunruhigende Visionen plagen seit vielen Nächten meinen Geist. Stimmen rufen und verfluchen meinen Namen. Und je mehr ich den Atlas nutze, desto klarer werden die Visionen und desto lauter werden die Stimmen ... und desto mehr lassen meine Kräfte nach. Ich bin sicher, dass das ganze Haus dasselbe erlebt, denn wir sind alle miteinander verbunden. Ich kann die Angst meiner Familie spüren. Das Haus Orsellio ist dazu verdammt, in der Dunkelheit zu verenden, sollte ich nicht in Erfahrung bringen, warum der Atlas geschwächt wird. Und ich glaube ... Ich glaube, dass der Grund irgendwo in meinen Visionen von Tisiphone verborgen liegt."

languages.text: "Bu gayrimaddi Atlas Sarayı'nda yapılacak toplantıyla ilgili birtakım hisler içime doğdu. Sıkıntılı yanılsamalar, kaç gecedir aklıma musallat oluyor. Sesler, adımı sayıklayıp bana lanet okuyor. Atlas'ı ne kadar çok kullanırsam bu görüler bir o kadar netleşiyor, sesler bir o kadar yükseliyor... Hakeza güçlerim de bir o kadar azalıyor. Birbirimize bağlı olduğumuzdan Hanemdeki herkesin aynısını yaşadığından eminim. Ailemin korkusunu sezebiliyorum. Atlas'ın neden güçsüz düştüğünü keşfedemezsem Orsellio Hanesi karanlıkta helak olacak. Bu işin cevabı... Bence Tisiphone'ye dair görülerimde saklı."
languages.original_text: "I cannot shake a certain foreboding about the upcoming meeting in the incorporeal Palace of the Atlas. Troubling mirages have plagued my mind for many nights now. Voices calling and cursing my name. And the more I use the Atlas, the clearer the visions become and the louder the voices grow... and the further my powers wane. I am certain that all of the House is experiencing the same, for all of us are connected. I can sense my family's fear. House Orsellio is doomed to perish in darkness should I fail to discover the reason why the Atlas is weakening. And that reason... I believe it is hidden somewhere in my visions of Tisiphone."

traits.locale_text: "Atlas Sarayı'nın tinsel hâlinde gerçekleşecek toplantı hakkında içime doğan birtakım hisler var. Sıkıntılı yanılsamalar, kaç gecedir aklıma musallat oluyor. Adımı sayıklayıp bana lanet okuyan sesler var. Atlas'ı ne kadar çok kullanırsam; bu görüler bir o kadar netleşiyor ve sesler de bir o kadar yükseliyor... Hakeza güçlerim de bir o kadar azalıyor. Tüm Hanemin aynısını yaşadığından eminim çünkü hepimiz birbirimize bağlıyız. Ailemin hissettiği korkuyu sezebiliyorum. Atlas'ın neden güçsüz düştüğünü keşfedemezsem, Orsellio Hanesi'nin karanlıkta helak olması kaçınılmaz. İşte o sebep... Bence o sebep, Tisiphone'yle ilgili görülerimde bir yerlerde saklı."
